title: Hello, honeydew world
body:
First post! This is a tiny JSON-powered blog living inside a microsite.
You can edit this file directly to add new entries.

The goal: keep things light, playful, and easy to change without touching HTML.

title: Treat this as an idea garden
body:
Instead of long, polished essays, think of each post as a small plant.
You can come back, prune, rewrite, or delete whenever you like.

JSON makes it easy to rearrange, tag, or archive posts later.
